markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Zevgavizeb](/Articles.aspx?ID=14)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 62

Unbury the dogma and mythos of the gluttonous demon lord [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82), god of subterranean horrors, cavern-dwelling reptiles, and debased [xulgaths](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102).
name: Zevgavizeb
